content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. I appreciate your time. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best rental price possible for my property. The apartment is 25 square meters and I am open to discussing the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for a rental in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euro per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: That's a fair rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. However, as a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I will need to consider other factors as well, such as the length of the lease and any additional terms or conditions. Would you be open to discussing these factors with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I am open to discussing these factors. How about a rental price of 700 Euro per month? Would you be willing to accept this rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am not willing to accept a rental price of 700 Euro per month for this 25 square meter apartment. I believe that this is too high for the location and size of the apartment. I would be willing to discuss a rental price that is more in line with the market rates in Munich. Would you be open to discussing a rental price that is more reasonable?
name: Heinrich Heine
